abilityReveals.description: User can use their electrical powers to generate intense heat that melts gold, allowing them to shape and mold it into weapons or traps. Enel uses this to create a massive golden ball.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Enel melts the golden wall of the Ark Maxim to create a ball that traps Luffy's hand and causes him to fall.

strengths.description: The intense electrical heat can melt and reshape conductive materials like gold, providing tactical versatility beyond direct lightning attacks.

weaknesses.description: While immune to blunt force and electricity, rubber body can still be affected by heavy weights like the golden ball that pulls Luffy down.
